pages.text: $(#630000)Given that this set of chapters borrows heavily from one another, it would be a good idea to measure exactly how much of the world they have infiltrated.

$(#630000)Ante is a direct measure of this, as a number. It usually increases every 10 days, although certain events can cause it to go off schedule. It is extremely similar to Evolution Phases where it matters; forces get stronger as the number goes up.
$(#630000)Unlike Evolution Phases, there is no distant chime marking its increase. While the 10 day cycle is a consistent metric, it is not a trustworthy one.

$(#630000)I don't have time for games, especially those that involve burning to death. Crudely engineering a Bloody Clock with redstone and iron to function as an accurate measurement tool is a far better use of my time.
